data.text:
When Harold Lloyd Pritt was born on 22 December 1929, in Union, Monroe, West Virginia, United States, his father, Harold Lynch Pritt, was 32 and his mother, Ethel Emma Ellison, was 21. He married Nancy Beirne Gilchrist on 18 August 1949, in Pickaway, Monroe, West Virginia, United States. He lived in Union District, Monroe, West Virginia, United States in 1940. He died on 1 September 2000, in Salt Lake City, Salt Lake, Utah, United States, at the age of 70, and was buried in Great Bend, Barton, Kansas, United States.
